revised_title: Exceptional Transonic States in Anisotropic Elastic Bodies
tldr: The article investigates the characteristics of surface-wave propagation in anisotropic elastic bodies, focusing on transonic states and their associated limiting waves. It shows that at most 2 transonic states can be exceptional, and there are precisely 4 combinations of exceptional transonic states involving only 3 of the 6 types. The study provides necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of these combinations and offers a complete characterization of exceptional transonic states in elastic materials with hexagonal symmetry.
